Hunker Down for Haunting Halloween Horrors in Death Mark Trailer
Related Article
paragraph:
Aksys Games is totally prepared for Halloween, because that's when the English version of Death Mark is set to make its debut. The horror adventure game by developer Experience (Demon Gaze) is coming to PS4, PS Vita, and Switch in North America, and you can see another brief sample of its many frights in the English gameplay trailer below.    -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine. You can read his webcomic, BIG DUMB FIGHTING IDIOTS at subhumanzoids. Follow him on Twitter @Moldilox.
